title: Load all 99 Names in Browse Mode
description: Verify that all 99 names are displayed correctly in Browse Mode with their categories, meanings, and audio playback available.

steps.description: Navigate to Browse Mode.
Check that the list contains exactly 99 names.
Verify each name shows its category and meaning summary.
Ensure the audio playback button is present for each name.

title: Toggle Card View between Collapsed and Expanded
description: Ensure that clicking or tapping a name card toggles between collapsed and expanded views showing detailed information including Quranic verses and linguistic conjugations.

steps.description: In Browse Mode, locate a name card.
Click or tap on the card to expand it.
Check that detailed information including Quranic verses and linguistic conjugations is displayed.
Click or tap again to collapse the card.
Confirm that the card returns to collapsed summary view.

title: Filter Names by Category
description: Validate the filtering functionality by categories: Jalal, Jamal, and Kamal, returning only names belonging to the selected category.

steps.description: Open filter options in Browse Mode.
Select category 'Jalal'.
Verify all displayed names belong to 'Jalal' category.
Change filter to 'Jamal'.
Verify all displayed names belong to 'Jamal' category.
Change filter to 'Kamal'.
Verify all displayed names belong to 'Kamal' category.

title: Filter Names by User Status
description: Verify filtering works for user status categories: Favorites and Memorized, showing correct subset of names accordingly.

steps.description: Mark some names as Favorites and some as Memorized in Browse Mode.
Apply filter for 'Favorites'.
All displayed names are marked as Favorites.
Apply filter for 'Memorized'.
All displayed names are marked as Memorized.

title: Real-time Search Functionality
description: Test real-time search by Arabic text, Swedish text, and sequence number to ensure correct names are retrieved instantly as user types.

steps.description: Focus on the search input.
Type partial Arabic text of a name.
Names matching Arabic text are displayed immediately.
Clear search and type partial Swedish meaning.
Names matching Swedish text are displayed immediately.
Clear search and type a sequence number (e.g. 25).
The name corresponding to that sequence number is displayed instantly.

title: Audio Playback of Name Pronunciation
description: Verify the audio pronunciation plays correctly and stops when toggled or another audio is played.

steps.description: In Browse Mode, click the audio playback button of a name.
Audio plays with high-quality pronunciation.
Click the audio button again to stop playback.
Audio stops playing.
Start playback on a different name while first audio is playing.
First audio stops and second audio plays.

title: Flashcard Mode - Card Flipping and Recall Logic
description: Check that flashcards flip smoothly to reveal meanings and that user responses ('I Know It' vs 'Study Again') adjust deck intelligently.

steps.description: Enter Flashcard Mode.
View flashcard front with name only.
Flip the card to see the meaning and details.
Flip animation is smooth and correct content is shown.
Mark the card as 'I Know It'.
Card is deprioritized or removed from active deck based on familiarity logic.
Mark another card as 'Study Again'.
Card remains or is prioritized for further review.

title: Quiz Mode - Multiple Choice and Fill-in-the-Blank Questions
description: Verify that quiz questions are presented correctly with accurate progress tracking and feedback after each answer.

steps.description: Start Quiz Mode.
Multiple-choice question is displayed with selectable options.
Select an answer in multiple choice.
Immediate feedback shown indicating correct or incorrect.
Proceed to fill-in-the-blank question.
Submit an answer.
Feedback is displayed and progress updates accordingly.

title: Premium Dark Mode Theme Validation
description: Ensure UI displays with deep black backgrounds, gold accents, elegant Arabic calligraphy fonts, and clean Swedish sans-serif fonts as per design standards.

steps.description: Enable dark mode in user settings.
Background color matches deep black specification.
Accent colors use gold as specified.
Arabic text uses the elegant calligraphy font.
Swedish text uses clean sans-serif font.

title: User Preferences Persistence
description: Verify font size and theme settings persist correctly across browser sessions using local storage.

steps.description: Set font size and dark mode theme in Settings.
Close and reopen the browser or reload the page.
User settings are restored and applied correctly.

title: Filtering and Sorting Performance
description: Verify that filtering and sorting by category and user status happen promptly with no noticeable UI lag.

steps.description: Apply multiple filters in quick succession.
Results update instantly with no lag or delay.
Sort the list by sequence number and then by name.
Sorting occurs smoothly without UI freezing.

title: Flashcard Mode Deck Management Edge Cases
description: Test deck behavior when all cards are marked 'I Know It' and when no cards are marked as 'I Know It'.

steps.description: Mark all flashcards as 'I Know It'.
Deck becomes empty or informs user accordingly.
Reset deck and mark none as 'I Know It'.
All cards continue to appear for study.

title: Quiz Mode Progress Tracking Accuracy
description: Ensure that the quiz progress tracking displays accurate counts and resets properly after quiz completion.

steps.description: Complete a quiz session of multiple questions.
Progress is accurately reflected during the quiz.
Finish the quiz and navigate to start a new quiz.
Progress counter resets properly to zero or initial state.

title: Instant Interface Feedback Animations
description: Validate that user interactions such as clicks, toggles, and card flips trigger subtle, instantaneous visual feedback animations.

steps.description: Interact with UI elements: buttons, cards, menu options.
Each interaction triggers a smooth and subtle animation instantly.

title: Accessibility and Responsive Design
description: Verify that the application is fully usable on various screen sizes including mobile, tablet, and desktop, and supports keyboard navigation.

steps.description: Open the application on screens of different sizes.
Layout adapts correctly without cutoff or overflow issues.
Navigate the application using keyboard only.
All interactive controls are reachable and usable.

title: Handling of Invalid Search Inputs
description: Ensure the search handles invalid inputs (e.g., special characters, unsupported scripts) gracefully, without errors or crashes.

steps.description: Enter special characters or unsupported text into the search field.
No errors appear and UI remains responsive.
Search returns no results or valid partial matches if any.

title: Reset User Preferences Functionality
description: Verify that the option to clear user preferences restores default settings and updates the UI accordingly.

steps.description: Change user preferences including font size and theme.
Use the settings menu to reset preferences to default.
Preferences revert to defaults.
UI appearance reflects default settings immediately.

title: Smoothness of UI Animations on Low-spec Devices
description: Test that UI animations and transitions remain smooth and do not cause noticeable lag on low performance hardware.

steps.description: Run the app on a low-spec device or simulate low performance environment.
Interact with card toggling, flashcard flipping, and menu animations.
Animations remain fluid without freezing or stuttering.
